column4: how do you change window managers?  I just downloaded one, and then restarted X.org, but i'm still in gnome now.
select options at the login screen?
ohh ok, i thought that was a gnome login screen.
it is, but you have options. :)
then how do i change back if i don't like the new one?  will it have a login screen that is similar?
I don't know, but I would think so?
It is probably defaulting to gnome?
